traits.name: Amphibious: The deep one can breath air and water
Deep Dweller: The deep one has advantage on stealth checks while underwater. In additon, it can't be harmed by water pressure
Use Magic Device: The deep one ignores all class requirements on the use of magic items

Eminence of the Void: as a bonus action, the deep one bishop can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to deal an extra 3d6 force damage to a target on a hit. The weapon attack is magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the bishop expends a spell slot of 2nd or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.
Spellcasting: is a 15th level spell caste. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom spell save DC 17, +9 to hitwith spell attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep one makes two claw attacks

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 2d4+4 slashing damage

spells: semblance of the key and the gate
